citation: Proclamation under the Occupational Licensing (Automatic Mutual Recognition Consequential Amendments) Act 2022 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Occupational Licensing (Automatic Mutual Recognition Consequential Amendments) Act 2022

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Occupational Licensing (Automatic Mutual Recognition Consequential Amendments) Act 2022 , fix 1 July 2023 as the day on which Parts 3 and 7 of that Act commence.

19 June 2023

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Workplace Safety and Consumer Affairs

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 June 2023

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
